extensions.name: Admin Links
extensions.purpose:
Admin Links is an extension to MediaWiki that defines a special page, "Special:AdminLinks",
that holds links meant to be helpful for wiki administrators;
it is meant to serve as a "control panel" for the functions an administrator would typically perform in a wiki.
All users can view this page; however, for those with the 'adminlinks' permission (sysops/administrators, by default),
a link to the page also shows up in their "Personal URLs", between "Talk" and "Preferences".

extensions.name: BreadCrumbs2
extensions.purpose: Implements a breadcrumb navigation based on categories

extensions.name: Cargo
extensions.purpose: Storage and querying of template data

extensions.name: ConfirmAccount
extensions.purpose: Gives bureaucrats the ability to confirm account requests

extensions.name: ConfirmEdit
extensions.purpose: Provides CAPTCHA techniques to protect against spam and password-guessing

extensions.name: Contribution Scores
extensions.purpose: The Contribution Scores extension polls the wiki database to locate contributors with the highest contribution volume.It is intended to add a fun metric for contributors to see how much they are helping out.

extensions.name: Data Transfer
extensions.purpose: Data Transfer is an extension to MediaWiki that allows users to both export and import data from and to the wiki, with export done in XML format and import possible in both XML, CSV and some spreadsheet formats.

extensions.name: Diagrams
extensions.purpose: Render Graphviz, Mscgen, and PlantUML diagrams in wiki pages.

extensions.name: Header Tabs
extensions.purpose: The Header Tabs extension transforms top-level MediaWiki headers into tabs using the jQuery UI JavaScript library.

extensions.name: InputBox
extensions.purpose: Allow inclusion of predefined HTML forms

extensions.name: Language Selector
extensions.purpose: Language selector on every page, also for visitors

extensions.name: MagicNoCache
extensions.purpose: The MagicNoCache extension creates a new magic word __NOCACHE__ and disables the cache for any page in which it finds it. Thus it makes sure that specific pages never get cached as they get updated extremely frequently

extensions.name: Maps7
extensions.purpose: Enables embedding of dynamic maps into wiki pages, geocoding of addresses and other geographical operations

extensions.name: Maps9
extensions.purpose: Enables embedding of dynamic maps into wiki pages, geocoding of addresses and other geographical operations

extensions.name: Mermaid
extensions.purpose: This extension provides the #mermaid parser function to support the generation of diagrams and flowcharts with the help of the mermaid script language.

extensions.name: MsUpload
extensions.purpose: The MsUpload extension allows users to upload multiple files by drag & drop in the standard MediaWiki edit page.

extensions.name: Network
extensions.purpose: The Network extension allows visualizing connections between wiki pages via an interactive network graph.

extensions.name: Nuke
extensions.purpose: The Nuke extension makes it possible for sysops to mass delete pages.

extensions.name: Page Forms
extensions.purpose: (known before 2016 as Semantic Forms) is an extension to MediaWiki that allows users to add, edit and query data using forms

extensions.name: ParserFunctions
extensions.purpose: Enhance parser with logical functions

extensions.name: PDFEmbed
extensions.purpose: Media handler extension for PDF files.

extensions.name: Renameuser
extensions.purpose: Adds a special page to rename a user (need renameuser right)

extensions.name: Replace Text
extensions.purpose: Provides a special page to allow administrators to do a global string find-and-replace on all the content pages of a wiki

extensions.name: Semantic Cite
extensions.purpose: Semantic Cite (a.k.a. SCI) is a Semantic Mediawiki extension that provides a simple way of organizing citation resources with the help of semantic annotations.

extensions.name: Semantic Result Formats
extensions.purpose: Additional result formats for Semantic MediaWiki queries

extensions.name: SparqlResultFormat
extensions.purpose: Enable the execution of sparql query to different endpoint and produce various output format.

extensions.name: SyntaxHighlight
extensions.purpose: syntax highlighting of diverse programming languages

extensions.name: UrlGetParameters
extensions.purpose: Allows to use and/or display the "GET" parameters of the URL on a wiki page

extensions.name: UserFunctions
extensions.purpose: Enhance parser with user functions

extensions.name: Variables
extensions.purpose: The Variables extension allows you to define a variable on a page, use it later in that same page or included templates

extensions.name: YouTube
extensions.purpose: Embeds YouTube movies, Archive.org audio and video, WeGame and Gametrailers video, and Tangler forum
